docs.lead_paragraph: Holy smokes! The Israeli government has taken a step toward decriminalizing marijuana use.

docs.lead_paragraph: The former Buddhist abbot at the heart of a standoff with authorities at Thailand's biggest temple has been stripped of his monastic rank by the king, the military government said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Thai King Strips Wanted Monk of His Rank
headline.main: Thai King Strips Wanted Monk of His Rank

docs.snippet: The former Buddhist abbot at the heart of a standoff with authorities at Thailand's biggest temple has been stripped of his monastic rank by the king, the military government said on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Pre-race favorite Romain Bardet has been disqualified from the Paris-Nice after being towed by his team car following a crash on the opening stage, organizers said on Sunday.
docs.snippet: Pre-race favorite Romain Bardet has been disqualified from the Paris-Nice after being towed by his team car following a crash on the opening stage, organizers said on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Andrea Belotti continued his impressive season by scoring an eight-minute hat-trick in Torino's 3-1 win over Palermo on Sunday while titleholders Juventus drew 1-1 at Udinese to go eight points clear at the top.

headline.print_headline: Belotti Scores Eight-Minute Hat-Trick, Juve Extend Lead
headline.main: Belotti Scores Eight-Minute Hat-Trick, Juve Extend Lead

docs.lead_paragraph: A casting director describes an hourslong wait in a dark stairwell and a refusal to consider women of color. Both charges have been denied.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two police commanders in Texas have been temporarily replaced as investigators determine who leaked police video and other material in the controversial arrest of a black woman and her daughters by a white Fort Worth police officer.

headline.print_headline: Texas Police Officials Reassigned Amid Leaked Video, Records
headline.main: Texas Police Officials Reassigned Amid Leaked Video, Records

docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank sees keeping hold of Postbank as more attractive now than it was two years due to changing market conditions, its chief executive told staff in a message after the bank announced plans for a rights issue and a revamp.

headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank CEO Says More Attractive to Keep Postbank Now
headline.main: Deutsche Bank CEO Says More Attractive to Keep Postbank Now

docs.snippet: Deutsche Bank sees keeping hold of Postbank as more attractive now than it was two years due to changing market conditions, its chief executive told staff in a message after the bank announced plans for a rights issue and a revamp....

docs.lead_paragraph: Ernesto Escobedo, the first Mexican-American man to break into the top 200 since the 1960s, is on a path similar to the Williams sisters’ in its genesis and improbability.
